EmailTemplate.description: To notify the owner when cycle count work order is created or owner is updated
EmailTemplate.name: Work Order : Notify Owner for Cycle Count
EmailTemplate.subject: Cycle Count Work Order {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Name} Assigned : {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMX_PS_Subject__c} : {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Case_Thread_ID__c}
